mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" A WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" A JOIN "ITEM_IMG" USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}

SELECT r.RESERVATION_NO, cs.CAMP_NAME, r.CAMP_ENTDATE, r.CAMP_OUTDATE FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN CAMPING_SITE cs ON r.CAMP_NO = cs.CAMP_NO WHERE r.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
AND r.CAMP_ENTDATE > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT r.RESERVATION_NO, cs.CAMP_NAME, r.CAMP_ENTDATE, r.CAMP_OUTDATE FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN CAMPING_SITE cs ON r.CAMP_NO = cs.CAMP_NO WHERE r.RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo}

SELECT i.ITEM_NO, i.ITEM_TYPE, i.ITEM_PRICE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, i.ITEM_STATUS, i.DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = i.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" i JOIN WISH_LIST w ON i.ITEM_NO = w.ITEM_NO WHERE w.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY w.WISHLIST_NO

SELECT i.ITEM_NO, i.ITEM_TYPE, i.ITEM_PRICE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, i.ITEM_STATUS, i.DISCOUNT_RATE, ci.RESERVATION_NO, ci.CART_ITEM_NO, ci.ITEM_QUANTITY, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = i.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" i INNER JOIN CART_ITEM ci ON i.ITEM_NO = ci.ITEM_NO INNER JOIN CART c ON ci.CART_NO = c.CART_NO WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT i.ITEM_NO, i.ITEM_TYPE, i.ITEM_PRICE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, i.ITEM_STATUS, i.DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = i.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" i JOIN "WISH_LIST" w ON i.ITEM_NO = w.ITEM_NO WHERE w.MEMBER_NO= #{memberNo}
